hero.name: Juan Catena
about.title: About Me
about.photoAlt: Photo of Juan Catena - Backend Developer
about.paragraph: I’m Juan Catena, a backend developer specialized in Java and Spring Boot. I design and build APIs, business logic, and internal systems that solve real operational needs — from inventory and billing management to workflow automation. I have previous experience working with Python and Django to develop internal company tools, and I’m currently deepening my expertise in backend architecture, microservices, SQL, and best practices to create stable, scalable, production-ready systems. My goal is straightforward: grow as a backend developer and deliver real value by building software that works, scales, and makes an impact.
projects.springtrip.title: SpringTrip — Java Backend
projects.springtrip.desc: Backend system for managing group trips, participants and shared expenses. Built with Java and Spring Boot using a modular, production-ready architecture. Currently in active development.
projects.title: Projects
projects.webstihl.title: Web Stihl
projects.webstihl.desc: Corporate website developed with Django, Python and TailwindCSS. Deployed to production on Render with a clean and professional design for a real company.
projects.todomotor.title: Todo Motor
projects.todomotor.desc: A themed blog about cars and motorcycles built with Django and Bootstrap 5. Includes a post system with categories, search function, admin panel and fully responsive design.
projects.scenra.title: Scenra App
projects.scenra.desc: Interactive web app built with React, TypeScript and Vite that allows users to explore movies and series, view trailers, cast, and create custom lists. Inspired by streaming platforms and powered by the TMDB API.
projects.travelsplit.title: TravelSplit
projects.travelsplit.desc: Web app to split and manage group travel expenses with automatic balances, interactive charts, guest mode and login
contact.title: Contact
contact.text: Want to collaborate or talk about a project? You can email me directly or connect through social networks.
projects.storeflow.title: StoreFlow
projects.storeflow.desc: Backend system for inventory, sales and workshop management, focused on real business rules, transactional integrity and stock consistency.
